animeDescription: Kasuga Serina is a cheerful girl and enjoys her school life. One day, she meets a handsome transfer student, Yukimura Yukinojo, who acts as if he were indifferent of others. Despite his behavior, she cannot help caring about him.  (Source: animenfo.com)
animeStaff: [['Kageyama Shigenori', ['Director', 'Script', 'Storyboard', 'Screenplay']], ['ELF Corporation', ['Original Creator']], ['Katou Hiroto', ['Animation Director']], ['Tahara Yuuko', ['Background Art']]]
